title: Starting over: The Story of a Teenage Girl's Road to Discovery About Love, Betrayal, Friendship and Life
description: Jessica (Jess) James is your average teenager. She had lived in a big city all her life, until her life is turned upside down when she finds out sheâ€™s moving to a small town. She is forced to leave the home she grew up in and leave her whole life behind, the good the bad, to start a new one. Follow Jessica as she discovers love, heartache, friendship and a lesson about life!
author: Brittany Perloff
